price: 216. Mpe soki baboyi kotosa yo, loba na bango ete: Ya soló ngai na nazali mosika na maye bozali kosala.
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
